This calculator converts block coordinates into chunk coordinates or vice versa.

<onlyinclude>{| class="wikitable calculator-container calculatorgadget-enabled" style="display: none; {{{style|}}}"
! Block Pos
| ({{Simplecalc|type=number|size=6|formula=floor(cx)*16+max(0, min(15, floor(cbx)))|id=bx|default=0}}, {{Simplecalc|type=number|formula=floor(cy)*16+max(0, min(15, floor(cby)))|size=6|id=by|default=0}}, {{Simplecalc|type=number|formula=floor(cz)*16+max(0, min(15, floor(cbz)))|size=6|id=bz|default=0}}) 
| [{{Simplecalc|type=number|size=2|formula=(16+floor(bx)%16)%16|id=cbx|min=0|max=15|default=0}} {{Simplecalc|type=number|size=2|formula=(16+floor(by)%16)%16|id=cby|min=0|max=15|default=0}} {{Simplecalc|type=number|size=2|formula=(16+floor(bz)%16)%16|id=cbz|min=0|max=15|default=0}}]
|-
! Chunk Pos
| ({{Simplecalc|type=number|size=6|formula=floor(bx/16)|id=cx|default=0}}, {{Simplecalc|type=number|size=6|formula=floor(by/16)|id=cy|default=0}}, {{Simplecalc|type=number|size=6|formula=floor(bz/16)|id=cz|default=0}})
| [{{Simplecalc|type=plain|formula=(32+floor(cx)%32)%32|default=0}} {{Simplecalc|type=plain|formula=(32+floor(cz)%32)%32|default=0}} in r.{{Simplecalc|type=plain|formula=floor(cx/32)|default=0}}.{{Simplecalc|type=plain|formula=floor(cz/32)|default=0}}.mca]
|}</onlyinclude>
